subject: RE: is require a keyword ?
body:
Thanks Jeff,
It helped

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Pang [mailto:pangj@earthlink.net] 
Sent: Friday, June 15, 2007 10:46 AM
To: Subject: Re: is require a keyword ?

Garg, Mayank IN BOM SISL $B  
> 
> Hi Guys,
> 
>             I was going thru a script which had the the lines:
> 
>  
> 
> require Exporter;
> 
> require DynaLoader;
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> what does these lines mean
> 

You may take a look at:
perldoc -f require
